/usr/bin/c++ -O3 -DNDEBUG -DMKL_Complex16="std::complex<double>" CMakeFiles/hops.dir/test_HOPS.cpp.o -o hops  -Wl,-rpath,/home/skasdorf/Documents/DROMON-main/lib /home/skasdorf/Documents/DROMON-main/lib/libDROMON.so /opt/intel/oneapi/mkl/2024.1/lib/libmkl_intel_lp64.so /opt/intel/oneapi/mkl/2024.1/lib/libmkl_intel_thread.so /opt/intel/oneapi/mkl/2024.1/lib/libmkl_core.so /opt/intel/oneapi/compiler/2024.1/lib/libiomp5.so -lm -ldl /usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/11/libgomp.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.a -lgsl
